schema\_dual\_column.standard\_formal: If a component of a tensor is a null mode (semantic zero) before Σ, and no explicit source or renormalization term is applied, then its contribution remains null after Σ.
schema\_dual\_column.igsoa\_formal: For any tensor component D\_α with semantic label s(α) \= 0\_sem, and contraction plan P, Σ\_P(D)\_β has contribution 0\_sem from α unless a non-null source operator S is explicitly applied.
